definition: brilliant white snow cover (esp. of distant peaks)

sentences.english: A few days later the weather finally cleared, revealing a completely white north face.
sentences.chinese: 数日后，天气转好，白雪皑皑的整个北壁一览无余。

sentences.english: Here in winter snow, snow mountains everywhere and a piece of white.
sentences.chinese: 这里的冬天白雪皑皑，到处银装素裹，一片洁白。

sentences.english: Japan's Mount Fuji, covered with snow, stands amidst the clouds.
sentences.chinese: 日本富士山，山峰高耸入云，山巅白雪皑皑。

sentences.english: The boy from Guangdong was amazed at the white snow.
sentences.chinese: 广东来的那个男孩看到白皑皑的雪很是惊讶。

sentences.english: I am the diamond glints of snow.
sentences.chinese: 我是钻石般闪耀的皑皑白雪。

sentences.english: In winter, white snow covers the whole earth.
sentences.chinese: 在冬天，整个大地都覆盖着白皑皑地雪。

sentences.english: I am in a thousand winds that blow, Across northreands azeroth.
sentences.chinese: 我是万千呼啸的风，飞过白雪皑皑的艾泽拉斯。

sentences.english: Road and hill were white with snow.
sentences.chinese: 路和山都是雪皑皑一片。

sentences.english: They're green when winter snow is white.
sentences.chinese: 当冬雪皑皑的时候，他们是绿的。

sentences.english: The coffin was got out of its rough box and down on the snowy platform.
sentences.chinese: 灵柩从粗笨的大箱子里搬出，摆在白雪皑皑的月台上。
下面是白雪皑皑的群峰。

sentences.english: Snowdon and the mountains beyond were covered in snow.
sentences.chinese: 斯诺顿和远处的山到处都是白雪皑皑。

sentences.english: The sun’s energy reflects off the bright white snow and escapes back out to space.
sentences.chinese: 皑皑白雪将太阳的能量反射，并返回太空。

sentences.english: Just beyond, snow and ice crest a pink mountain. Ahh …
sentences.chinese: 远处，皑皑冰雪覆于山脊，化作了粉色山躯的冠饰。

sentences.english: Standing in the snow capped peaks, let a person have a kind of feeling of the clouds.
sentences.chinese: 站在白雪皑皑的山峰，让人有一种腾云驾雾的感觉。

sentences.english: From the snow-capped Changbai Mountains down to the vast South China Sea frontier.
sentences.chinese: 从白雪皑皑的长白山下到辽阔的南海边疆。

definition: brilliant white snow cover (esp. of distant peaks)
(of mist, snow, floodwater etc) a vast expanse of whiteness
frost forming a pattern on a surface/rime
snow/snowfall/CL:場|场[chang2]/to have the appearance of snow/to wipe away, off or out/to clean
evergreen pine and cypress (idiom); steadfast nobility
